Risk-reward statistics for quant trading

Source: R/tradeStats.R
tradeStats.Rd

Compute list of risk reward metrics

tradeStats(x, Rf = 0)

Arguments

x

Univariate xts object of returns OR dataframe with date and return variables.

Rf

Risk-free rate

Value

List of risk/reward metrics.

Author

Philippe Cote

Examples

library(PerformanceAnalytics)
#> Loading required package: xts
#> Loading required package: zoo
#> 
#> Attaching package: ‘zoo’
#> The following objects are masked from ‘package:base’:
#> 
#>     as.Date, as.Date.numeric
#> 
#> Attaching package: ‘PerformanceAnalytics’
#> The following object is masked from ‘package:graphics’:
#> 
#>     legend
x <- tidyquant::tq_get("SPY") %>% dplyr::mutate(ret = log(adjusted / dplyr::lag(adjusted)))
#> Registered S3 method overwritten by 'quantmod':
#>   method            from
#>   as.zoo.data.frame zoo 
x <- x %>%
  stats::na.omit() %>%
  dplyr::select(date, ret)
tradeStats(x = x, Rf = 0)
#> Warning: Non-numeric columns being dropped: date
#> $CumReturn
#> [1] 2.29243
#> 
#> $Ret.Ann
#> [1] 0.1222
#> 
#> $SD.Ann
#> [1] 0.1649
#> 
#> $Sharpe
#> [1] 0.7411
#> 
#> $Omega
#> [1] 0.1653
#> 
#> $`%.Win`
#> [1] 0.5572254
#> 
#> $`%.InMrkt`
#> [1] 0.9965438
#> 
#> $DD.Length
#> [1] 264
#> 
#> $DD.Max
#> [1] -0.3574586
#>
